title: Steam-promoted symmetry optimizations of perovskite electrodes for protonic ceramic cells
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02233E, Paper
Feng Zhu, Mingyang Hou, Zhiwei Du, Fan He, Yangsen Xu, Kang Xu, Hui Gao, Ying Liu, Yu Chen
Under typical operating conditions of reversible protonic ceramic cells, the injection of steam into lattices may promote the transformation of the monoclinic structure to a stable cubic PBSCC perovskite structure with higher symmetry.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
